EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Marion, You are more than welcome. Just let me know if you have any questions. Take care,Sara From: Marion English [mailto:marion.a.english@gmail.com] Sent: Monday, June 11, 2012 12:36 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Call Summery Hi Sara-Thanks for the info. Will be in touch. ~MarionOn Mon, Jun 11, 2012 at 12:11 PM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote:Dear Marion, It was a pleasure speaking with you. You’ll find everything that I referenced on our call by going here. <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-s-conde.html?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlBLvEh4pf3XJ6fqkzzTcrivtr10Bbnl3cJUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> (Please bookmark this page) I have also attached the additional net cash estimates we discussed. We are also promoting our new meet the independents project and are taking applications if you would like to be featured. You can view the program by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/meet-the-independents.html?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlBLvEh4pf3XJ6fqkzzTcrivtr10Bbnl3cJUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. I will follow up with you as promised, should you have questions before then, please schedule a convenient time using my online schedule. <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlBLvEh4pf3XJ6fqkzzTcrivtr10Bbnl3cJUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Best regards,Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028 <tel:703.793.6028>f: 703.793.6068 <tel:703.793.6068>e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlBLvEh4pf3XJ6fqkzzTcrivtr10Bbnl3cJUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlBLvEh4pf3XJ6fqkzzTcrivtr10Bbnl3cJUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential.
